newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: EDP not planning to boost stake in Efacec.
newsitem.headline: EDP not planning to boost stake in Efacec.

text.p: Portuguese state electricity company EDP-Electricidade de Portugal is not planning to boost its stake in electrical engineering concern Efacec-Empresa Fabril de Maquinas Electricas, a director of EDP said.
"No initiative has been taken in this regard," Humberto Bio told Reuters.
EDP, which will be partially privatised later this month, now has a stake of about five percent in Efacec.
There have been rumours in the Lisbon share market that EDP planned to boost its stake in Efacec.
Efacec shares stood at 1,584 escudos, up 25, in volume of 229,877 on Lisbon bourse at 1135 GMT.
